thumb.title: Unhappy Ending feat.SELENA
thumb.description: 初めての英語歌詞ですMusic, Lyric : HuiyuVocal : SELENAYour melancholy chantSpells that make me what you want I know how this story beganWatered your heart, you got so greedyI squeezed myself dry, all for you so needyYou got full and threw up on meI will change my clothes, all for your sakeA single ray of light A spider's thread so thinSolid peace of one's mind Abundant love so kindI'm sinking down Sinking again somehow The anchor that was you is gone today The ship with no wheel runs wildGravity melted away We both drown, in the endYou don't know what comes next in this tale And you know nothing about me at allAfter allEscape routes for you all meaninglesswe're just illegal waste thrown asideBonds that are steel-strong Trust runs deep and long Hope is just fictionThis is happy endI'm breaking down Breaking again, unboundThe collar that was you won't stayA cursed dragon runs with rageEternity has flowed awayWe both burn up, end of this stage
